notes:
It is a living [[Northern Pike]].
When dead it may reappear as a [[Slippery Northern Pike]]. If you kill again, they turn into a [[Northern Pike]] (fish).
history: Until the patch [[Updates/13.12.13018|13.12.13018]] [[Northern Pike (Creature)]] could be convinced for 0 mana.
name: Northern Pike (Creature)
bestiarytext: This very rare fish is not a common sight, not even to the eyes of experienced fishermen. With a healthy dose of luck, the Northern Pike can be caught in many lakes across Tibia. Given the ability of going underwater, the adventurous explorer can also experience these frail creatures in their natural habitats. Catching them without a fishing rod, however, can be a challenging task.
behaviour: Quickly swims away from hostile foes.
location: [[Fiehonja]] (3? in {{Mapper Coords|130.177|121.215|12|4|text=Library}}, 2 at {{Mapper Coords|130.87|122.5|12|4|text=Spiral}}, 2 at {{Mapper Coords|130.142|122.27|15|4|text=Vortex}}, 1 at {{Mapper Coords|130.166|122.87|14|4|text=Entrance}}).
strategy: Just kill them, they won't harm you.
